---
title: "flipt-namespace-foo.yml"
---

## High-level description
This YAML file defines a configuration for a feature flagging system named Flipt. It specifies a namespace, flags, variants, rules, segments, and constraints for feature flag management and experimentation.

## Code Structure
The YAML file is structured hierarchically, with the main elements being `namespace`, `flags`, and `segments`. The `flags` section contains nested elements for `variants` and `rules`, while the `segments` section includes `constraints`.

## Symbols

### namespace
#### Description
Defines the namespace for the configuration.

#### Inputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| namespace | string | The name of the namespace |

### flags
#### Description
Defines a list of feature flags.

#### Inputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| key | string | Unique identifier for the flag |
| name | string | Human-readable name for the flag |
| description | string | Description of the flag's purpose |
| enabled | boolean | Whether the flag is enabled or not |
| variants | array | List of variants for the flag |
| rules | array | List of rules for flag distribution |

### variants
#### Description
Defines the variants of a feature flag.

#### Inputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| key | string | Unique identifier for the variant |
| name | string | Human-readable name for the variant |

### rules
#### Description
Defines the rules for distributing variants.

#### Inputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| segment | string | The segment key to which the rule applies |
| rank | integer | The priority of the rule |
| distributions | array | List of variant distributions |

### distributions
#### Description
Defines how variants are distributed within a rule.

#### Inputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| variant | string | The variant key to distribute |
| rollout | integer | The percentage of users to receive this variant |

### segments
#### Description
Defines segments of users for targeting.

#### Inputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| key | string | Unique identifier for the segment |
| name | string | Human-readable name for the segment |
| description | string | Description of the segment's purpose |
| constraints | array | List of constraints defining the segment |

### constraints
#### Description
Defines the conditions for a user to be included in a segment.

#### Inputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| type | string | The type of comparison to perform |
| property | string | The user property to evaluate |
| operator | string | The comparison operator |
| value | string | The value to compare against |

## Configuration
This YAML file serves as a configuration for the Flipt feature flagging system. It defines:

1. A namespace named "foo"
2. One feature flag with key "zUFtS7D0UyMeueYu"
3. Two variants for the flag
4. One rule for flag distribution
5. One segment with two constraints

The flag is enabled and has a rule that distributes 100% of traffic to the variant with key "NGxfcVffpMhBz9n8" for users in the segment "08UoVJ96LhZblPEx".

The segment "08UoVJ96LhZblPEx" is defined with two string comparison constraints:
1. The property "foo" must equal "baz"
2. The property "fizz" must not equal "buzz"

This configuration allows for targeted feature rollouts based on user properties and segmentation.
